categories: Category:Commission for the Preservation of the New Order

nodes.text: The Imperial Office of Customs, also known simply as Imperial Customs, was a division of the Commission for the Preservation of the New Order that ensured all importers and exporters operated in full compliance with the Galactic Empire's laws and regulations. Its agents routinely used TIE Boarding Crafts to access freighters, inspect cargoes, and maintain authority. When he was still a smuggler, the Sullustan Nien Nunb had to deal with Imperial Customs when caught by Star Destroyers on many occasions.
